review: The film was absolutely stunning! Great acting and a fantastic plot line. Loved it!
Worst movie I've seen all year. Predictable, boring, and the sound mix was terrible.
It was okay, not great, not terrible. Just a solid B-movie experience.
I can't believe they spent $200M on this. What a waste of talent and time.
Truly a masterpiece of modern cinema. Don't miss this one.
